item.title: Test Their Logik European Tour
item.content_encoded: Test Their Logik is currently on a ten-week tour of Europe promoting their new album "A". They’ll be traveling everywhere between England, Greece, and Catalonia, stopping at the anarchist book fair in London and the G20 in Cannes and playing shows at legendary squats and social centers. Joining them at some of these shows will be some of the best European anti-authoritarian hip-hop acts, including Mary Read Collectif, DJ Malatesta, and Drowning Dog. Gent Sept. 28 Leuven Sept. 29 Amsterdam Sept. 30 Leiden Oct. 4 Utrecht Oct. 5 Berlin Oct. 6 Hamburg Oct. 7 Gottingen Oct. 8 Milton Keynes Oct. 11 Basingstoke Oct. 12 Exeter Oct. 13 Bristol Oct. 14 Brighton Oct. 15 London Oct. 16 Nottingham Oct. 17 Leamington Oct. 18 Chesterfield Oct. 19 Leeds Oct. 20 Liverpool Oct. 21 London Anarchist Bookfair Oct. 22 Calais Oct. 24 Paris Oct. 25 (need help) Dijon Oct. 26 (need help) St. Etienne Oct. 27 Millau Oct. 28 Barcelona Oct. 29 Marseilles Oct. 31 (need help) G20 at Cannes Nov. 1-5 9 November / Reggio calabria – Csoa Cartella 10 November / Palermo – Facoltà Lettere e Filosofia 11 November / Barcellona P.G – C.P:P. Il Pane e le Rose 12 November / Milan – C.O.A. T28 via dei Transiti 28 (help us fill this gap!) 22 November / Austria – EKH 23 November / Koper (TBC) 24 November / Ljubljana 25 November / Zagreb – Attack 26 November / Zadar – Studentski Klub 27 November / Belgrade 28 November / Zrenjanin 29 November / Kraljevo 30 November / Nis 01 December / Thessaloniki (TBC) 02 December / Volos 03 December / Athens Nosotros social center Exarchia sq. After Athens, Testament plans to continue on to Egypt. Contact testtheirlogik@gmail.com to offer assistance booking shows, and also for media requests or to propose collaborations.
